participant_1.name: Emily
participant_1.personality: Creative and warm-hearted, Emily finds joy in crafting and sharing her baked goods.
participant_1.background: i love to bake cookies. knitting is my passion. the county wide bake sale is where i feel most at home. i'm scared of dying. i've a dogs.

participant_2.name: James
participant_2.personality: Thoughtful and adventurous, James enjoys exploring new ideas and flavors.
participant_2.background: i'm a huge star wars fan. i try various coffees as a hobby. i enjoy poetry. i played football for a division a college.

content.text: i am retired but i love baking cookies for the bake sale   you
